snippet: “Divided We Stand” by Marjorie J. Spruill recalls a 1977 women’s rights conference that ended up energizing the anti-feminist opposition....

headline.main: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate
headline.print_headline: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate

lead_paragraph: “Divided We Stand” by Marjorie J. Spruill recalls a 1977 women’s rights conference that ended up energizing the anti-feminist opposition.
